Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Mango Languages, PressReader, and Kanopy are some of the language learning and travel resources available on the Morale, Welfare and Recreation Digital Library website. The website also provides free access to a variety of resources, including e-books, audiobooks, movies, academic support, test prep, professional development, and career transition.

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The website offers a variety of language learning resources, including apps and tools such as Mondly, italki, uTalk, Glossika, Busuu, Babbel, LingQ, Duolingo, and Memrise. It also offers courses such as Michel Thomas, Uncovered Beginner Courses by Olly Richards, and Bite-Size Immersive Audio Courses by Actual Fluency, as well as language exchange mobile app Tandem and popular podcast Coffee Break Languages. The website also provides reviews of language learning tools and apps, travel phrase guides, and dictionaries. 
 
 Links: ['Home (https://www.theintrepidguide.com)', 'Travel Guides (https://www.theintrepidguide.com/destinations/)', 'Australia (https://www.theintrepidguide.com/destinations/oceania/australia/)', 'Austria (https://www.theintrepidguide.com/destinations/europe/austria/)', 'Belgium (https://www.theintrepidguide.com/destinations/europe/belgium/)']

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The website offers several language learning and travel resources, including Global Road Warrior, Mango Languages, A to Z World Travel, A to Z World Food, and Gale Database - Hospitality and Tourism. 
 
 Links: ['Skip to Main Content (https://www.anacorteswa.gov/232/Language-Learning-Travel#cc70cf4744-4456-49eb-adba-205286e5a41b)', ' (https://www.anacorteswa.gov/)', ' (https://www.anacorteswa.gov/Search/Results)', 'Your Government (https://www.anacorteswa.gov/27/Your-Government)', 'For Residents (https://www.anacorteswa.gov/31/For-Residents)']

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The website offers a 2019 holiday gift guide for little language learners and travel lovers, which includes stocking stuffers such as alphabet blocks, conversation starters, language games, and useful phrase books. There are also toys to enjoy again and again, such as age-appropriate world map puzzles, bilingual puzzles for Spanish learners, a bilingual board game, and alphabet tracing boards in different languages. Additionally, there are subscriptions available for boxes, music, and more, including Amazon Music Unlimited, Booklandia, Hola Amigo, TalkBox Mom, and SnackCrate. 
 
 Links: ['Language Learning At Home (https://languagelearningathome.com/)', 'Home (https://languagelearningathome.com/)', 'Meet Anne (https://languagelearningathome.com/about)', 'Get Updates  (https://languagelearningathome.com/get-updates)', 'Full Disclosure (https://languagelearningathome.com/full-disclosure)']

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: According to the website, some of the best places to learn a language abroad are Salatiga in Java, Indonesia for learning Indonesian, Lisbon in Portugal for learning European Portuguese, Maceio and Fortaleza in Brazil for learning Brazilian Portuguese, Madrid in Spain for learning Spanish, Medellin in Colombia for learning Spanish, Sucre in Bolivia for learning Spanish, and Zaragoza in Spain for learning Castellano Spanish. 
 
 Links: ['Vendor List (javascript:void(0);)', 'Privacy Policy (https://growingglobalcitizens.com/privacy-policy/)', '\n\t\tSkip to content (https://growingglobalcitizens.com/the-best-places-to-learn-a-language-abroad/#content)', '\n  (https://growingglobalcitizens.com)', 'Teach Abroad (https://growingglobalcitizens.com/teach-abroad/)']

3. Consider adding a `if __name__ == '__main__':` block to the code to avoid running the `print` statements when the module is imported.

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The best ways to learn a language abroad are living with native speakers, watching local TV shows, accepting invitations, keeping a vocabulary book, practicing grammar and verb drills, and consistently speaking the local language. Immersion in the local language is the most effective way to learn a foreign language while living abroad.

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides information about the top Spanish language schools in Spain based on a ranking system that considers factors such as popularity, prices, location, organization, and range of study programs. The ranking only includes schools accredited by the Instituto Cervantes and members of FEDELE, which ensure high-quality teaching of Spanish in Spain. The article lists the top 15 schools, including International House Valencia, Hispania Escuela de Espaol in Valencia, Cervantes Escuela Internacional in Malaga, Tia Tula-Spanish School in Salamanca, and Proyecto Espaol in Granada and Alicante. However, the text does not provide information about the best language schools in Spain.
